name: D Dream Selector
description:
A submission for the LSDJAM 2022. 

The game itself is inspired by LSD Dream Emulator and Yume Nikki. 

Explore four different dream dioramas and take in the atmosphere. 

Controls 

  • WASD - Movement 
  • Mouse Camera Control 
  • [E] to interact with certain things and progress dialogue
  • [Tab] to wake up
  • [Esc] to quit the game

Note

If any bugs or issues pop up I'll try to fix them asap. Version 0.3 is also the first time someone else will playtest it.
